gen:link.msg:message: `ChangeAccountingPolicies` MOET NIET gerapporteerd worden, omdat de gerapporteerde waarde van `OpeningClosingBalanceSheetDifference` gelijk is aan `Nee`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ChangeOfStatementPreviousReportingPeriodHousingDvi_PrtValueThnNoExistence1_OpeningClosingBalanceSheetDifference')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ChangeOfStatementPreviousReportingPeriodHousingDvi_PrtValueThnNoExistence1_OpeningClosingBalanceSheetDifference return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ChangeOfStatementPreviousReportingPeriodHousingDvi_PrtValueThnNoExistence1_ChangeAccountingPolicies')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ChangeOfStatementPreviousReportingPeriodHousingDvi_PrtValueThnNoExistence1_ChangeAccountingPolicies return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`ChangeAccountingPolicies` met de waarde `Ja` en/of `PriorPeriodErrors` met de waarde `Ja` en/of `OtherDifferences` met de waarde `Ja` MOET minimaal één keer voorkomen, omdat de gerapporteerde waarde van `OpeningClosingBalanceSheetDifference` gelijk is aan `Ja`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ChangeOfStatementPreviousReportingPeriodHousingDvi_PrtValueCovAThn03ValueOR1_Set00OpeningClosingBalanceSheetDifference')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ChangeOfStatementPreviousReportingPeriodHousingDvi_PrtValueCovAThn03ValueOR1_Set00OpeningClosingBalanceSheetDifference return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ChangeOfStatementPreviousReportingPeriodHousingDvi_PrtValueCovAThn03ValueOR1_Set01ChangeAccountingPolicies')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ChangeOfStatementPreviousReportingPeriodHousingDvi_PrtValueCovAThn03ValueOR1_Set01ChangeAccountingPolicies return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ChangeOfStatementPreviousReportingPeriodHousingDvi_PrtValueCovAThn03ValueOR1_Set02PriorPeriodErrors')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ChangeOfStatementPreviousReportingPeriodHousingDvi_PrtValueCovAThn03ValueOR1_Set02PriorPeriodErrors return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ChangeOfStatementPreviousReportingPeriodHousingDvi_PrtValueCovAThn03ValueOR1_Set03OtherDifferences')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ChangeOfStatementPreviousReportingPeriodHousingDvi_PrtValueCovAThn03ValueOR1_Set03OtherDifferences return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`OtherDifferences` MOET NIET gerapporteerd worden, omdat de gerapporteerde waarde van `OpeningClosingBalanceSheetDifference` gelijk is aan `Nee`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ChangeOfStatementPreviousReportingPeriodHousingDvi_PrtValueThnNoExistence3_OpeningClosingBalanceSheetDifference')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ChangeOfStatementPreviousReportingPeriodHousingDvi_PrtValueThnNoExistence3_OpeningClosingBalanceSheetDifference return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ChangeOfStatementPreviousReportingPeriodHousingDvi_PrtValueThnNoExistence3_OtherDifferences')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ChangeOfStatementPreviousReportingPeriodHousingDvi_PrtValueThnNoExistence3_OtherDifferences return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`PriorPeriodErrors` MOET NIET gerapporteerd worden, omdat de gerapporteerde waarde van `OpeningClosingBalanceSheetDifference` gelijk is aan `Nee`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ChangeOfStatementPreviousReportingPeriodHousingDvi_PrtValueThnNoExistence2_OpeningClosingBalanceSheetDifference')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ChangeOfStatementPreviousReportingPeriodHousingDvi_PrtValueThnNoExistence2_OpeningClosingBalanceSheetDifference return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ChangeOfStatementPreviousReportingPeriodHousingDvi_PrtValueThnNoExistence2_PriorPeriodErrors')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ChangeOfStatementPreviousReportingPeriodHousingDvi_PrtValueThnNoExistence2_PriorPeriodErrors return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
